food: A classic burger with cheese topped with crispy bacon and onion rings then drizzeled with barbecue sauce.
A 6 patty burger with cheese on every slice and lettect tomatos and pickles down below.
A hamburger topped with cheese and bacon between two glazed donuts.
Our custom-blended, a veggie patty is piled high with Swiss cheese, lightly fried, Parmesan-sprinkled mushrooms, tomato bruschetta salsa, fresh avocado slices on a whole-grain bun.
Our signature burger loaded with Wisconsin cheddar cheese curds, then topped with american cheese and hickory-smoked bacon and finished with cool heat sauce. Served with french fries.
Vanille ice cream topped with chocolate syrup, sprinkles, nuts, whip cream and a cherry.
Strawberry Ice Cream topped with whip cream, nerds, sprinkles, cotton candy, and an assortment of other candies.
A Chocolate Chip Cookie topped with vanilla ice cream and hot fudge.
SKILLET CHOCOLATE CHIP COOKIE A LA MODE
Chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, topped with vanilla ice cream in a chocolate shell. Big enough to share, too good to actually do it.
Three cannoli shells are dipped in dark and white chocolate and stuffed with Blue Bunny Pistachio Almond, Chocolate and Super Premium Vanilla Bean Ice Cream and sprinkled with nuts.
Crunchy dill pickle slices are cornmeal-breaded, fried and served with our southwestern ranch dressing.
Julienne strips of heads of broccoli, carrots and red cabbage.
Warm tortilla chips are paired with our own house-blended salsa in this timeless classic.
Straight cut fries smothed in a cheese of your choice then mounted with bacon.
PageTexts: Our burgers aren't the ordinary run of the mill burgers. A strange place needs strange food so that's why we chose only the top of the food chain. These burgers were made to put you to the test, so pick your posion and see if you can keep up.

Still craving for more? Well these sweet monsters will finish the job. Fight the urge of devouring the cookies and creams cake, swim in the lava lake of molten chocolate, or find a rare creature's.... droppings. We've got the sweets so here's to hoping you've got the tooth.
Sometimes, you really just can't beat the classics. Fried pickles, onion rings, loaded fries and more. We just wanted to make sure that you felt at home with these sides.
